name: Clever Kids: Pony World
description:
Back of Case - PlayStation 2 (AUS) (from Ad Blurbs)

Pony World brings the magic of the stable yard to life. Meet the animals, learn the facts and become a stable master.
  • Play a whole host of fun and educational games; spot the difference, test your stable knowledge, build a Pony-puzzle and much, much more!
  • Pony Grooming - Learn how to groom ponies using the intuitive control system.
  • Find The Pony - Go against the clock to identify and match ponies by their distinctive markings.
Clever Kids is a brand new multi-format product range from Midas featuring hugely enjoyable and yet educationally beneficial gaming products.
